name: tollchain
description: TollChain - Blockchain-based automated toll collection system with QR code scanning and privacy-preserving authentication

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:qr
scripts.test:qr: npm run test:qr-generation && npm run test:qr-scanner
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install && cd ../contracts && forge install

author: TollCrypt Team
